summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Expense Tracker app. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend core functionality works well including user auth, AI expense categorization, AI financial advisor, and data visualization. Found UI issues with dropdown selections in dialogs.

ui_bugs.issue: Manual category dropdown options not clickable - timeout when selecting Transportation
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot manually select expense categories, must rely on AI categorization

ui_bugs.issue: Budget category dropdown options not clickable - timeout when selecting Food
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot set budgets due to category selection failure

passed_tests: User login with JWT token authentication
Add expense with AI auto-categorization (GPT-4o working)
View expenses list with categories and amounts
Dashboard stats display (total expenses, top category, monthly)
AI Financial Advisor - personalized advice generation
All backend API endpoints (13/13 tests passed)
JWT token validation and user profile retrieval
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Shadcn Select component dropdown clickability issues in AddExpenseDialog and SetBudgetDialog. The dropdown options are visible but not clickable, preventing manual category selection for expenses and budget setting. This appears to be a z-index or event handling issue with the Select components.
